mapper.select: SELECT * FROM gztls_device ORDER BY device_id

SELECT a.device_name , a.device_id , a.device_latitude , a.device_longitude , a.device_address , b.data_type , b.data_content , b.server_time FROM gztls_device a JOIN ( SELECT device_id , data_type , data_content , server_time FROM gztls_success
AND server_time = DATE_FORMAT(#{server_time}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND device_id = #{device_id}
GROUP BY device_id , data_type , data_content ) b
AND a.device_id = b.device_id
AND device_address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{device_address}, '%')
ORDER BY device_id, data_type;
SELECT data_type , server_time , data_content FROM gztls_success WHERE server_time BETWEEN #{from_date} AND #{to_date} AND device_id = #{device_id};
